external_references.description: Rufus Brown, Van Ta, Douglas Bienstock, Geoff Ackerman, John Wolfram. (2022, March 8). Does This Look Infected? A Summary of APT41 Targeting U.S. State Governments. Retrieved July 8, 2022.

objects.description: During [C0017](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0017), [APT41](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0096) issued [Ping](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0097) commands to trigger DNS resolutions for data exfiltration, where the output of a reconnaissance command was prepended to subdomains within [APT41](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0096)'s Cloudflare C2 infrastructure.(Citation: Mandiant APT41)
